title: MTA Will Reopen Some Subway Bathrooms For First Time In January 2023
description: Of the subway systemâ€™s 472 stations, 69 have bathrooms. In January, eight of them will reopen, now that more cleaners have been hired.
dc:creator: Ana Ley
media:credit: Uli Seit for The New York Times
media:description: The M.T.A. is reopening eight public restrooms in its subway system following the hiring of hundreds of cleaners.
